name: Royal Stout
description: Anyone can have a kingly moment with just a few simple ingredients.
preparation: Using a Y-peeler, peel two strips of rind from orange and twist. Juice remaining orange using a 2-in-1 Citrus Press.
Divide stout between two glasses, layer in Earl Grey tea, and top with orange juice.

products.name: 2-in-1 Citrus Press
summary: Easily squeeze the juice from small citrus fruits like lemons, limes, clementines & tangerines.
